metadata.title: CVE-2018-7640 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in CImg v.220. A heap-based buffer over-read inload_bmp in CImg.h occurs when loading a crafted bmp image, a differentvulnerability than CVE-2018-7588. This is in a Monochrome case, aka case 1.

criterions.comment: cimg: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
